channel.title: Really Nooby Question.. :\
channel.description: Okay, I haven;t tried to code or run a server in a long long time and I want to get back into it.. but the client I ahve won't load, i but the cache in the right place n the client starts by saying "dowloading cache" then changes to "connection error - retrying in 5 seconds" can anyone help me? does the cache need a name for the file cause its currently on "cache" please help
